attributes.action: Change the HMRC Guidelines so that Annually PAYE can furlough themselves
attributes.additional_details:
Those on Annual PAYE should all be entitled to receive financial support equal to those on Monthly PAYE. Either the date needs to be changed from 19th March 2020 to a later date so annual PAYE can submit an RTI or for previous years 2018-2019 to be used. It can be sorted out. 
Many small business owners/sole limited directors are not receiving any income at all and are suffering due to this. Please allow them to get the financial support they need urgently. Please sign & share. Thank you 🙏🏻
attributes.background: To change the HMRC guidelines to enable Annual PAYE to claim in the furlough scheme which will then be equal to the monthly PAYE.
